description: How to mark manual-data-entry step as complete

value.description: Value to set on 'entity_path'. Note: this MUST always be passed as a string. The input filter is responsible for transforming the value to the correct data type

entity_field.description: JSON Path to the field on the entity. If the path does not start with '$' then the entity on the context is assumed. Otherwise the data will be set on the context path
